about.title: BACO Engineering
about.description:
BACO INGENIERÍA S.A.S is the result of years of experience, teamwork, and the dedication of outstanding professionals who have left their mark on the industry. Since 2017, our leadership has been driving various projects, laying the foundation for an engineering company committed to innovation and excellence.
In 2023, we officially launched operations to provide technical and technological solutions in pumping systems, water treatment, pools and spas, sanitary hot water, and irrigation. We specialize in serving the residential, commercial, and industrial sectors, ensuring efficiency, quality, and a sustainable approach in every project.
about.mission: Our mission is to be a benchmark in hydraulic and thermal engineering, delivering advanced solutions that optimize water usage and contribute to sustainable development.
